title: Chief Technology Officer
text: Peter MD getpetermd.com is the largest online men's health clinic in North America. As of Feb 2023 I am now the new Chief Technology Officer overseeing all technology and infrastructure for the company.

title: Software Engineer & Fractional CTO
text: Grayling Agency is one of the highest-rated digital marketing teams on UW. As part of an internal initiative to leave UW behind Grayling Acquired Apollo Intel and our clients in April of 2022. I stayed as their part-time CTO to continue the Apollo product development and handle the backend tech for the company.

title: Co-Founder & Business Owner
text: Core Nutrition is a brick-and-mortar shop that provides nutritional supplements and coaching. My wife and I founded the business in 2021. On top of the standard startup business tasks, I handle all company branding on and offline and digital marketing for the shop. I also built a nutrition coaching platform with a Django backend and React/NEXT frontend that runs on AWS EC2 + Vercel.

title: Software Engineer & Founder
text: Apollo is a multi-channel, cold outreach SaaS that we couple with digital campaigns to generate B2B leads using automation and sentiment analysis. I built the first iterations of the product alone using a Flask backend, AWS lambda functions for automation, and an ugly Bootsrap admin panel but launched with a working MVP and 5 paying clients. Six months later I took on a small team that included another engineer and together we rebuilt the admin panel in Vue.js, brought in a sentiment service that we built using IBM's Watson AI, and redesigned our infrastructure to scale horizontally with added load from usage.

title: Software Engineer
text: I was brought on to build a new scalable, cloud-hosting environment for clients to replace onsite hardware systems. I also built a field service reporting system to replace paper forms for all field engineers. I stayed on for a few years as a fractional developer for different clients as well as an entry-level systems engineer for a few large-sized client projects.

title: Web Developer
text: I supported over 8,000 active websites running on the LinkU platform. We ran a Windows server, IIS, MSSQL, and Classic ASP/VB stack that physically ran in a local data center. I handled all junior to mid-level development projects including feature builds, escalated support issues, and front-end development changes.
